amendment.description: To amend title 10, United States Code, to restrict bundling of Department of Defense contract requirements that unreasonably disadvantages small businesses.

vote.text: Amendment SA 757 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 757 proposed by Senator Collins. (consideration: CR S6793-6797; text: CR S6793-6794) To amend title 10, United States Code, to restrict bundling of Department of Defense contract requirements that unreasonably disadvantages small businesses.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 757 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 757 proposed by Senator Collins.
